SELECT COUNT(no) FROM community
title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT no, bbs_no AS bbsNo, reply_content AS replyContent, replyid, replydate, replyrecommend, replymedic, replybusinessAdd, replybusinessName FROM reply WHERE bbs_no = #{no} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(title, id, content, medic,regdate, readcount, category) VALUES(#{title}, #{id}, #{content}, #{medic}, DEFAULT, 0, #{category})

INSERT INTO reply(bbs_no, reply_content, replyid, replydate, replymedic, replybusinessName, replybusinessAdd) VALUES(#{bbsNo}, #{replyContent}, #{replyid}, NOW(), #{replymedic}, #{replybusinessName}, #{replybusinessAdd})
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET reply_content = #{replyContent}, replydate = NOW() WHERE no = #{no}
